name: MoveItUp (BOMDING TECHNOLOGY)
description:
MOVE IT UP V 1.1 brings a unique rhythm game experience. 

Random Level generator: Tired of fixed level challenge? Here we provide a brand-new random level generator in 2 new game modes. Every time is a new and unexpected challenge that will never be repeated.Battle Mode: Who is the best? Let's just battle then we will know. Attack & defense each other during the battle to conquer your opponents.Survival Mode: With a medley challenge near to 10 minutes, speed is getting faster and faster, the rhythm ball is more and more, the goal of the game is in front of you, how long can you persist to survive?
